00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: RooFit                                                           
00003  * Package: BToDKTo3piK                                                     
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkDalitzSmear.rdl,v 1.1 2006/03/20 19:04:31 fwinkl Exp $
00005  * Authors:                                                                  
00006  *   Frank Winklmeier, Colorado State University                             
00007  * Description:                                                              
00008  *   Class to smear a Dalitz PDF with a resolution model for m12 and m13.
00009  *   BdkDalitzSmear is not a fully functional RooAbsPdf itself.                    
00010  *   Only generate() can be used on it. I.e. does not support fitting.       
00011  *                                                                           
00012  * Copyright (c) 2006, Colorado State University                             
00013  *****************************************************************************/
